zha_reconfigure_device.heading: Reconfiguring device

areas.description: Oorsig van alle gebiede in u huis.

picker.introduction: Gebiede word gebruik om toestelle te organiseer gebaseer op waar hulle is. Hierdie inligting sal regdeur FLH HomeX gebruik word om u te help om u koppelvlak, toestemmings en integrasies met ander stelsels te organiseer.
picker.introduction2: Om toestelle in 'n gebied te plaas, gebruik die skakel hieronder om na die integrasies bladsy toe te gaan en klik dan op 'n opgestelde integrasie om na die toestelkaarte toe te gaan.
picker.no_areas: Dit lyk asof jy nog geen gebiede het nie!

tag.caption: Tags
tag.description: Trigger automations when a NFC tag, QR code, etc. is scanned
tag.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove tag {tag}?

detail.name: Name
detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

energy.caption: Energy
energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption

grid.title: Electricity grid
grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows FLH HomeX to track your whole home energy usage.
grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

from.paragraph: Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
from.cost_para: Select how FLH HomeX should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
from.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs
from.cost_entity: Use an entity with current price

to.paragraph: Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
to.cost_para: Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
to.no_cost: I do not get money back
to.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
to.cost_entity: Use an entity with current rate

solar.title: Solar Panels
solar.sub: Let FLH HomeX monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
solar.stat_return_to_grid: Solar energy returned to the grid
solar.stat_predicted_production: Prediction of your solar energy production

battery.title: Home Battery Storage
battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
battery.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

gas.title: Gas Consumption
gas.sub: Let FLH HomeX monitor your gas usage.
gas.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

dialog.paragraph: Gas consumption is the volume of gas that flows to your home.

dialog.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs

customize.caption: Pasgemaakte Instellings

picker.introduction: Verfyn per-entiteit eienskappe. Bygevoegde / gewysigde aanpassings sal onmiddellik in werking tree. Verwyderde aanpassings sal in werking tree wanneer die entiteit opgedateer word.

warning.include_sentence: Dit lyk asof u konfigurasie.yaml nie behoorlik is nie
warning.not_applied: Wysigings wat hier aangebring is, word daarin geskryf, maar sal nie toegepas word na die herlaai van die konfigurasie nie, tensy die insluit in plek is.

customize.attributes_customize: Die volgende kenmerke is reeds opgestel in customize.yaml

customize.attributes_override: Jy kan hulle oorheers as jy wil.
customize.attributes_not_set: Die volgende eienskappe is nie gestel nie. Stel dit in as u wil.

picker.introduction: Die outomatiseringsredakteur stel u in staat om outomatisasies te skep en te wysig. Volg die onderstaande skakel om die instruksies te lees om seker te maak dat u FLH HomeX korrek opgestel het.
picker.learn_more: Kom meer te wete oor outomatisasies
picker.no_automations: Ons kon nie redigeerbare outomatisasies vind nie
picker.only_editable: Slegs automasies omskryf in outomatisering. yaml is redigeerbaar.
picker.dev_only_editable: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
picker.delete_confirm: Is u seker dat u hierdie outomatisering wil uitvee?

dialog_new.how: How do you want to create your new automation?

thingtalk.header: Describe the automation you want to create
thingtalk.intro: And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.

editor.introduction: Gebruik outomatisasies om jou huis lewend te maak
editor.load_error_not_editable: Slegs outomatisasies in automations.yaml kan verander word.
editor.unsaved_confirm: U het ongestoorde veranderinge. Is u seker u wil die blad verlaat?

blueprint.no_inputs: This blueprint doesn't have any inputs.

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

triggers.name: Sneller
triggers.introduction: Snellers is wat die prosessering van 'n outomatiseringsreël afskop. Dit is moontlik om verskeie snellers vir dieselfde reël te spesifiseer. Sodra 'n sneller begin, sal FLH HomeX die voorwaardes, indien enige, bevestig en die aksie roep.
triggers.learn_more: Kom meer te wete oor snellers
triggers.id: Trigger ID (used by the trigger condition)
triggers.delete_confirm: Is u seker u wil dit skrap?

conditions.name: Voorwaarde
conditions.introduction: Voorwaardes is 'n opsionele deel van 'n outomatiseringsreël en kan gebruik word om te verhoed dat 'n aksie plaasvind wanneer dit geaktiveer word. Voorwaardes lyk baie soos snellers maar is baie anders. 'n Sneller sal kyk na gebeure wat in die stelsel gebeur terwyl 'n voorwaarde net kyk hoe die stelsel lyk. Byvoorbeeld: 'n Sneller kan sien dat 'n skakelaar aangeskakel word. 'n Voorwaarde kan net sien of 'n skakelaar tans aan of af is.
conditions.learn_more: Kom meer te wete oor voorwaardes
conditions.delete_confirm: Is u seker u wil dit skrap?

actions.name: Aksie
actions.introduction: Die aksies is wat FLH HomeX sal doen wanneer die outomatisering geaktiveer word.
actions.learn_more: Kom meer te wete oor aksies
actions.delete_confirm: Is u seker u wil dit skrap?

task_selection.introduction: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a FLH HomeX automation.
task_selection.language_note: Note: Only English is supported for now.
task_selection.error_empty: Enter a command or tap skip.
task_selection.error_unsupported: We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).

link_devices.header: Great! Now we need to link some devices

picker.introduction: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured FLH HomeX correctly.

modes.label: Mode

picker.introduction: Die toneel redakteur kan jy om te skep en wysig skerms. Volg asseblief die skakel hieronder om die instruksies te lees om seker te maak dat jy het ingestel Huis Assistent korrek.

picker.only_editable: Slegs tonele gedefinieër in tonele.yaml kan geredigeer word.

editor.name: Naam

devices.introduction: Voeg die toestelle wat u wil insluit in u toneel by. Stel toestande van toestelle na verlange in vir hierdie toneel.

entities.introduction: Entiteite wat nie aan 'n toestel behoort nie, kan hier ingestel word.
entities.device_entities: As u 'n entiteit byvoeg wat aan 'n toestel behoort, word die toestel bygevoeg.

cloud.description_features: Beheer terwyl weg van die huis af is, integreer met Alexa en Google Assistant.

login.title: Cloud Login
login.introduction: FLH HomeX Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: This service is run by our partner
login.introduction2a: , a company founded by the founders of FLH HomeX and Hass.io.
login.introduction3: FLH HomeX Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
login.learn_more_link: Learn more about FLH HomeX Cloud
login.alert_password_change_required: You need to change your password before logging in.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: You need to confirm your email before logging in.

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.subtitle: Forgot your password
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with FLH HomeX Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of FLH HomeX Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of FLH HomeX away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of FLH HomeX and Hass.io.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of FLH HomeX Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for FLH HomeX Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your FLH HomeX instance publicly on the internet.

tts.title: Text to Speech
tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.

dialog.example_message: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!

remote.title: Remote Control
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: FLH HomeX Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

remote_enabled.caption: Verbind outomaties
remote_enabled.description: Skakel hierdie opsie in om seker te maak dat u Home Assistent-instansie altyd op afstand toeganklik is.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for FLH HomeX Cloud you'll be able to control all your FLH HomeX devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the FLH HomeX skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, FLH HomeX will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for FLH HomeX Cloud you'll be able to control all your FLH HomeX devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the FLH HomeX Cloud skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, FLH HomeX will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
google.enter_pin_hint: Enter a PIN to use security devices
google.sync_entities_404_message: Kon nie u entiteite met Google sinkroniseer nie, vra Google 'Hallo Google, sinkroniseer my toestelle' om u entiteite te sinkroniseer.
google.not_configured_text: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the FLH HomeX Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to FLH HomeX from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

dialog_cloudhook.available_at: The webhook is available at the following URL:
dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can
dialog_cloudhook.confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this webhook?

devices.add_prompt: No {name} have been added using this device yet. You can add one by clicking the + button above.
devices.caption: Devices
devices.name: Naam
devices.enabled_description: Disabled devices will not be shown and entities belonging to the device will be disabled and not added to FLH HomeX.

automation.create_disable: Can't create automation with disabled device
automation.no_device_automations: Daar is geen outomatisasies vir hierdie toestel beskikbaar nie.

script.create_disable: Can't create script with disabled device

scene.create_disable: Can't create scene with disabled device

devices.cant_edit: U kan slegs items wat in die UI geskep is, wysig.

entities.none: Hierdie toestel het geen entiteite nie

devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Wil u ook die entiteit-ID's van u entiteite hernoem?
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids_warning: This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
devices.confirm_disable_config_entry: There are no more devices for the config entry {entry_name}, do you want to instead disable the config entry?
devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?

picker.introduction: FLH HomeX hou 'n register van al die vorige entiteite wat uniek geïdentifiseer kan word. Elk van hierdie entiteite sal 'n entiteit-ID hê wat vir hierdie entiteit gereserveer sal word.
picker.introduction2: Gebruik die entiteitsregister om die naam te oorskryf, die entiteit ID te verander, of die inskrywing van FLH HomeX te verwyder. Let wel, die verwydering van die entiteit registerinskrywing sal nie die entiteit verwyder nie. Om dit te doen, volg die skakel hieronder en verwyder dit uit die integrasies bladsy.

enable_selected.confirm_text: Dit sal dit weer beskikbaar in die huis assistent maak as hulle nou gedeaktiveer is.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Ge deaktiveerde entiteite sal nie by die Huisassistent gevoeg word nie.

remove_selected.confirm_text: Entiteite kan slegs verwyder word as die integrasie nie meer die entiteite bied nie.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart FLH HomeX before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

person.caption: Persone
person.description: Bestuur die persone wat FLH HomeX op spoor.
person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in FLH HomeX.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Note: people configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any people yet.
person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
person.person_not_found: We couldn't find the person you were trying to edit.

detail.name: Naam
detail.device_tracker_intro: Kies die toestelle wat aan hierdie persoon behoort.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
detail.device_tracker_pick: Kies toestel om op te spoor
detail.confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete the user account for {name}? You can still track the user, but the person will no longer be able to login.

zone.caption: Sones
zone.description: Bestuur die sones waarin jy mense wil naspoor.
zone.introduction: Met sones kan u sekere streke op aarde spesifiseer. As 'n persoon binne 'n sone is, neem die toestand die sonenaam aan. Sones kan ook as 'n sneller of toestand gebruik word in outomatiseringsinstellings.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Lyk asof jy nog geen sones geskep het nie.
zone.confirm_delete: Is u seker dat u hierdie inskrywing wil verwyder?
zone.configured_in_yaml: Sones gekonfigureer via konfigurasie.yaml kan nie via die UI geredigeer word nie.
zone.edit_home_zone: Die ligging van u tuissone kan vanaf die algemene konfigurasiebladsy verander word. Die radius van die Tuis-sone kan nog nie vanaf die voorkant verander word nie. Wil u na die algemene opset gaan?
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: Die ligging van u tuissone kan vanaf die algemene konfigurasiebladsy verander word. Die radius van die Tuis-sone kan nog nie vanaf die voorkant verander word nie. Wil u na die algemene opset gaan?
zone.home_zone_core_config: Die ligging van u tuissone kan vanaf die algemene konfigurasiebladsy verander word. Die radius van die Tuis-sone kan nog nie vanaf die voorkant verander word nie. Wil u na die algemene opset gaan?

detail.name: Naam
detail.icon_error_msg: Ikone moet in die formaat 'voorvoegsel: iconname' wees, byvoorbeeld 'mdi: home'
detail.passive_note: Passiewe sones is weggesteek in die Frontend en word nie gebruik as ligging vir toestelspoorsnyers nie. Dit is nuttig as jy net wil om dit te gebruik vir outomatisering.

integrations.caption: Integrasies
integrations.confirm_new: Do you want to set up {integration}?
integrations.no_integrations: Lyk asof jy nog nie enige integations gekonfigureer het nie. Klik op die knoppie hieronder om jou eerste integrasie te voeg!
integrations.note_about_integrations: No integrations matched your search, the integration you want to set up might not be available to set up via the UI yet.
integrations.rename_dialog: Redigeer die naam van hierdie config-inskrywing

ignore.confirm_ignore: Is u seker dat u nie hierdie integrasie wil instel nie? U kan dit ongedaan maak deur op die 'Wys geïgnoreerde integrasies' in die oorloopmenu regs bo te klik.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: Dit sal die integrasie weer in u ontdekte integrasies laat verskyn wanneer dit ontdek word. Dit kan herbegin of 'n geruime tyd neem.

config_entry.delete_confirm: Is u seker u wil hierdie integrasie skrap?
config_entry.restart_confirm: Herbegin FLH HomeX om hierdie integrasie te voltooi
config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Restart FLH HomeX to finish reloading this integration
config_entry.disable_restart_confirm: Restart FLH HomeX to finish disabling this integration
config_entry.enable_restart_confirm: Restart FLH HomeX to finish enabling this integration
config_entry.disable_error: Enabling or disabling of the integration failed

disable.disable_confirm: Are you sure you want to disable this config entry? Its devices and entities will be disabled.

config_entry.disabled_polling: Automatic polling for updated data disabled

config_flow.not_all_required_fields: Nie alle vereiste velde is gevul nie.

external_step.description: Hierdie stap vereis dat u 'n eksterne webwerf besoek om voltooi te word.

pick_flow_step.title: We discovered these, want to set them up?
pick_flow_step.new_flow: No, set up an other instance of {integration}

loading.loading_flow: Please wait while {integration} is being setup

config_flow.could_not_load: Config flow could not be loaded
config_flow.not_loaded: The integration could not be loaded, try to restart FLH HomeX.

users.caption: Gebruikers
users.users_privileges_note: The user group feature is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.

editor.caption: Bekyk gebruiker
editor.name: Display name
editor.system_generated_users_not_removable: Unable to remove system generated users.
editor.system_generated_users_not_editable: Unable to update system generated users.
editor.confirm_user_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

node_query_stages.protocolinfo: Obtaining basic Z-Wave capabilities of this node from the controller
node_query_stages.probe: Checking if the node is awake/alive
node_query_stages.wakeup: Setting up support for wake-up queues and messages
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific1: Obtaining manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeinfo: Obtaining supported command classes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeplusinfo: Obtaining Z-Wave+ information from the node
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific2: Obtaining additional manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.versions: Obtaining information about firmware and command class versions
node_query_stages.instances: Obtaining details about what instances or channels a device supports
node_query_stages.static: Obtaining static values from the device
node_query_stages.cacheload: Loading information from the OpenZWave cache file. Battery nodes will stay at this stage until the node wakes up.
node_query_stages.neighbors: Obtaining a list of the node's neighbors
node_query_stages.session: Obtaining infrequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.dynamic: Obtaining frequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.configuration: Obtaining configuration values from the node

refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
refresh_node.description: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
refresh_node.battery_note: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
refresh_node.wakeup_instructions_source: Wake-up instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.

details.driverallnodesqueriedsomedead: All nodes have been queried. Some nodes were found dead
details.driverawakenodesqueries: All awake nodes have been queried
details.driverfailed: Failed to connect to Z-Wave controller

select_instance.introduction: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
select_instance.none_found: We couldn't find an OpenZWave instance. If you believe this is incorrect, check your OpenZWave and MQTT setups and ensure that FLH HomeX can communicate with your MQTT broker.

node_config.introduction: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
node_config.help_source: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
node_config.wakeup_help: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Devices will show up here once discovered.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
clusters.introduction: Clusters is die boustene vir Zigbee-funksionaliteit. Dit skei funksionaliteit in logiese eenhede. Daar is kliënt- en bedienertipes wat bestaan uit eienskappe en opdragte.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

device_pairing_card.INITIALIZED_status_text: The device is ready to use

groups.caption: Groepe
groups.group_details: Hier is al die besonderhede vir die geselekteerde Zigbee groep.
groups.create_group_details: Voer die nodige besonderhede in om 'n nuwe zigbeegroep te skep

group_binding.group_picker_help: Kies 'n groep om 'n bindopdrag uit te reik.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Kies groepe om aan die geselekteerde groep te bind.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Bind die geselekteerde groep by die geselekteerde toestelgroeperings.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Ontbind die geselekteerde groep van die geselekteerde toestelgroeperings.

ozw.introduction: This wizard will help you migrate from the legacy Z-Wave integration to the OpenZWave integration that is currently in beta.

network_management.introduction: Begin opdragte wat die Z-Wave-netwerk beïnvloed. U sal nie terugvoer kry of meeste opdragte slaag nie, maar u kan die OZW-logboek nagaan om dit uit te vind.

node_management.introduction: Run Z-Wave commands that affect a single node. Pick a node to see a list of available commands.
node_management.nodes_hint: Select node to view per-node options
node_management.exclude_entity: Exclude this entity from FLH HomeX

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: Afhangend van die grootte van u netwerk, kan dit 'n rukkie duur.
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Aktiewe Knooppunte is nagevra. Slapende Knooppunte sal nagevra word sodra hulle ontwaak.

dashboard.introduction: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
dashboard.dump_debug: Download a dump of your network to help diagnose issues
dashboard.dump_dead_nodes_title: Some of your devices are dead
dashboard.dump_dead_nodes_text: Some of your devices didn't respond and are assumed dead. These will not be fully exported.
dashboard.dump_not_ready_title: Not all devices are ready yet
dashboard.dump_not_ready_text: If you create an export while not all devices are ready, you could miss needed data. Give your network some time to query all devices. Do you want to continue with the dump?

node_config.introduction: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
node_config.attribution: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
node_config.battery_device_notice: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
node_config.set_param_queued: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.

add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Device
add_node.controller_in_inclusion_mode: Your Z-Wave controller is now in inclusion mode.
add_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
add_node.inclusion_failed: The device could not be added. Please check the logs for more information.
add_node.interview_started: Die toestel word ondervra. Dit kan 'n geruime tyd neem.
add_node.interview_failed: Die toestelonderhoud het misluk. Bykomende inligting kan moontlik in die logboeke beskikbaar wees.

S2_Unauthenticated.title: S2 Unauthenticated
S2_Unauthenticated.description: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included

S2_Authenticated.title: S2 Authenticated
S2_Authenticated.description: Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems

S2_AccessControl.title: S2 Access Control
S2_AccessControl.description: Example: Door Locks and Garage Doors

S0_Legacy.title: S0 Legacy
S0_Legacy.description: Example: Legacy Door Locks without S2 support

remove_node.title: Remove a Z-Wave device
remove_node.introduction: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from FLH HomeX.
remove_node.controller_in_exclusion_mode: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
remove_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
remove_node.exclusion_failed: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
remove_node.exclusion_finished: Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.

remove_failed_node.title: Remove a Failed Z-Wave Device
remove_failed_node.introduction: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
remove_failed_node.in_progress: The device removal is in progress.
remove_failed_node.removal_finished: Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
remove_failed_node.removal_failed: The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.

reinterview_node.title: Re-interview a Z-Wave Device
reinterview_node.introduction: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
reinterview_node.in_progress: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

heal_network.title: Heal your Z-Wave Network
heal_network.introduction: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
heal_network.traffic_warning: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
heal_network.in_progress: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
heal_network.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
heal_network.healing_failed: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
heal_node.introduction: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
heal_node.traffic_warning: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
heal_node.healing_failed_check_logs: Additional information may be available in the logs.
heal_node.network_heal_in_progress: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.

logs.title: Z-Wave JS Logs
logs.subscribed_to_logs: Subscribed to Z-Wave JS Log Messages…

cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

actions.action_confirmation: Are you sure you want to run action ''{action}''?
actions.no_entity_more_info: No entity provided for more info dialog

empty_state.title: Welkom tuis
empty_state.no_devices: Hierdie bladsy laat u toe om u toestelle te beheer, maar dit lyk asof u nog nie toestelle opgestel het nie. Gaan na die integrasies bladsy om te begin.

safe-mode.description: Home Assistent het probleme ondervind tydens die laai van u konfigurasie en loop nou in 'n veilige modus. Kyk na die foutlogboek om te sien wat verkeerd geloop het.

starting.description: FLH HomeX begin tans, wag asseblief ...

unused_entities.title: Ongebruikte entiteite
unused_entities.available_entities: Dit is die entiteite wat u beskikbaar het, maar is nog nie in u Lovelace UI nie.
unused_entities.select_to_add: Kies die entiteite wat u op 'n kaart wil voeg, en klik dan op die kaart voeg.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: U kan nie hierdie funksie gebruik wanneer u Lovelace UI in die YAML-modus gebruik nie.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: Jy kan hierdie funksie net gebruik wanneer jy beheer van die Lovelace UI geneem het.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?

raw_editor.lovelace_changed: The Lovelace config was updated, do you want to load the updated config in the editor and lose your current changes?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Is jy seker jy wil jou Lovelace UI-konfigurasie verwyder? Ons sal outomaties jou Lovelace UI-uitsig met jou areas en toestelle genereer.
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: Ons sal outomaties jou Lovelace UI-uitsig met jou areas en toestelle genereer as jy jou Lovelace UI-konfigurasie verwyder.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: U het ongestoorde veranderinge. Is u seker u wil die blad verlaat?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: U konfigurasie bevat kommentaar, dit sal nie gestoor word nie. Wil jy voortgaan?
raw_editor.error_invalid_config: U opstelling is nie geldig nie: {error}
raw_editor.resources_moved: Hulpbronne moet nie meer by die Lovelace-konfigurasie gevoeg word nie, maar kan bygevoeg word in die Lovelace-konfigurasiepaneel.

edit_lovelace.explanation: This title is shown above all your views in the Lovelace UI.
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Select which users should see this view in the navigation

edit_badges.view_no_badges: Badges are not be supported by the current view type.

edit_card.pick_card: Kies die kaart wat u wil byvoeg.
edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

suggest_card.header: Ons het 'n voorstel vir jou geskep

save_config.header: Neem beheer van u Lovelace gebruikerskoppelvlak
save_config.para: FLH HomeX sal outomaties u gebruikerskoppelvlak handhaaf, dit opdateer wanneer nuwe entiteite of Lovelace-komponente beskikbaar raak. Alhoewel, as u beheer neem, sal FLH HomeX nie meer outomaties veranderings vir u doen nie.
save_config.para_sure: Is u seker u wil beheer neem oor u gebruikerskoppelvlak?
save_config.yaml_mode: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your Lovelace config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your Lovelace configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: Om te help hier is die huidige konfigurasie van die paneelbord

migrate.para_no_id: Hierdie element het nie 'n ID nie. Voeg asseblief 'n ID by vir hierdie element in 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
migrate.para_migrate: Druk die 'Migreer konfigurasie' knoppie as u wil hê FLH HomeX moet vir u ID's by al u kaarte en aansigte outomaties byvoeg.

alarm-panel.name: Alarm Panel
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
conditional.condition_explanation: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
entities.edit_special_row: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button

entity.name: Entity
entity.description: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity’s state.

button.name: Knoppie
button.description: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Entity Filter
entity-filter.description: The Entity Filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.

gauge.name: Gauge
gauge.description: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.

glance.name: Glance
glance.description: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.

logbook.name: Logbook
logbook.description: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.

history-graph.name: History Graph
history-graph.description: The History Graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.

statistics-graph.name: Statistics Graph
statistics-graph.description: The Statistics Graph card allows you to display a graph of the statistics for each of the entities listed.

horizontal-stack.name: Horizontal Stack
horizontal-stack.description: The Horizontal Stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.

humidifier.name: Humidifier
humidifier.description: Die Luchtbevochtigerkaart verleen beheer oor u lugbevochtiger-entiteit. Hiermee kan u die humiditeit en modus van die entiteit verander.

iframe.name: Webblad
iframe.description: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into FLH HomeX.

light.name: Light
light.description: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.

generic.manual_description: Need to add a custom card or just want to manually write the YAML?
generic.name: Name
generic.title: Title

map.name: Map
map.description: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.

media-control.name: Media Control
media-control.description: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.

picture.name: Picture
picture.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

picture-elements.name: Picture Elements
picture-elements.description: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.

picture-entity.name: Picture Entity
picture-entity.description: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.

picture-glance.name: Picture Glance
picture-glance.description: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more info dialog.

plant-status.name: Plant Status
plant-status.description: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.

sensor.name: Sensor
sensor.description: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.

shopping-list.name: Shopping List
shopping-list.description: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
shopping-list.integration_not_loaded: Hierdie kaart vereis die ' shopping_list ' integrasie wat opgestel moet word.

thermostat.name: Thermostat
thermostat.description: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.

vertical-stack.name: Vertical Stack
vertical-stack.description: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.

weather-forecast.name: Weather Forecast
weather-forecast.description: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.

panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: This view contains more than one card, but a panel view can only show 1 card.

warning.starting: FLH HomeX is starting, not everything may be available yet

changed_toast.message: Die Lovelace-opstelling is opgedateer, wil u graag herlaai?

profile.logout_text: Is u seker dat u wil afmeld?

force_narrow.description: Dit sal die sybalk by aanvang verberg, soortgelyk aan die mobiele ervaring.

customize_sidebar.header: Change the order and hide items from the sidebar
customize_sidebar.description: You can also press and hold the header of the sidebar to activate edit mode.

vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.

enable_shortcuts.description: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.

state.not_available: Add-on is not available on your system

configuration.no_configuration: This add-on does not expose configuration for you to mess with…

dashboard.not_available_arch: This add-on is not compatible with the processor of your device or the operating system you have installed on your device.
dashboard.not_available_version: You are running FLH HomeX {core_version_installed}, to update to this version of the add-on you need at least version {core_version_needed} of FLH HomeX
dashboard.visit_addon_page: Visit the {name} page for more details

protection_mode.title: Warning: Protection mode is disabled!
protection_mode.content: Protection mode on this add-on is disabled! This gives the add-on full access to the entire system, which adds security risks, and could damage your system when used incorrectly. Only disable the protection mode if you know, need AND trust the source of this add-on.

stage.title: Add-on Stage
stage.description:
Add-ons can have one of three stages:

{icon_stable} **Stable**: These are add-ons ready to be used in production.

{icon_experimental} **Experimental**: These may contain bugs, and may be unfinished.

{icon_deprecated} **Deprecated**: These add-ons will no longer receive any updates.

rating.title: Add-on Security Rating
rating.description:
FLH HomeX provides a security rating to each of the add-ons, which indicates the risks involved when using this add-on. The more access an add-on requires on your system, the lower the score, thus raising the possible security risks.

A score is on a scale from 1 to 6. Where 1 is the lowest score (considered the most insecure and highest risk) and a score of 6 is the highest score (considered the most secure and lowest risk).

host_network.title: Host Network
host_network.description: Add-ons usually run in their own isolated network layer, which prevents them from accessing the network of the host operating system. In some cases, this network isolation can limit add-ons in providing their services and therefore, the isolation can be lifted by the add-on author, giving the add-on full access to the network capabilities of the host machine. This gives the add-on more networking capabilities but lowers the security, hence, the security rating of the add-on will be lowered when this option is used by the add-on.

homeassistant_api.title: FLH HomeX API Access
homeassistant_api.description: This add-on is allowed to access your running FLH HomeX instance directly via the FLH HomeX API. This mode handles authentication for the add-on as well, which enables an add-on to interact with FLH HomeX without the need for additional authentication tokens.

full_access.title: Full Hardware Access
full_access.description:
This add-on is given full access to the hardware of your system, by request of the add-on author. Access is comparable to the privileged mode in Docker. Since this opens up possible security risks, this feature impacts the add-on security score negatively.

This level of access is not granted automatically and needs to be confirmed by you. To do this, you need to disable the protection mode on the add-on manually. Only disable the protection mode if you know, need AND trust the source of this add-on.

hassio_api.title: Supervisor API Access
hassio_api.description: The add-on was given access to the Supervisor API, by request of the add-on author. By default, the add-on can access general version information of your system. When the add-on requests 'manager' or 'admin' level access to the API, it will gain access to control multiple parts of your FLH HomeX system. This permission is indicated by this badge and will impact the security score of the add-on negatively.

docker_api.title: Full Docker Access
docker_api.description:
The add-on author has requested the add-on to have management access to the Docker instance running on your system. This mode gives the add-on full access and control to your entire FLH HomeX system, which adds security risks, and could damage your system when misused. Therefore, this feature impacts the add-on security score negatively.

This level of access is not granted automatically and needs to be confirmed by you. To do this, you need to disable the protection mode on the add-on manually. Only disable the protection mode if you know, need AND trust the source of this add-on.

host_pid.title: Host Processes Namespace
host_pid.description:
Usually, the processes the add-on runs, are isolated from all other system processes. The add-on author has requested the add-on to have access to the system processes running on the host system instance, and allow the add-on to spawn processes on the host system as well. This mode gives the add-on full access and control to your entire FLH HomeX system, which adds security risks, and could damage your system when misused. Therefore, this feature impacts the add-on security score negatively.

This level of access is not granted automatically and needs to be confirmed by you. To do this, you need to disable the protection mode on the add-on manually. Only disable the protection mode if you know, need AND trust the source of this add-on.

apparmor.title: AppArmor
apparmor.description:
AppArmor ('Application Armor') is a Linux kernel security module that restricts add-ons capabilities like network access, raw socket access, and permission to read, write, or execute specific files.

Add-on authors can provide their security profiles, optimized for the add-on, or request it to be disabled. If AppArmor is disabled, it will raise security risks and therefore, has a negative impact on the security score of the add-on.

auth_api.title: FLH HomeX Authentication
auth_api.description: An add-on can authenticate users against FLH HomeX, allowing add-ons to give users the possibility to log into applications running inside add-ons, using their FLH HomeX username/password. This badge indicates if the add-on author requests this capability.

ingress.title: Ingress
ingress.description: This add-on is using Ingress to embed its interface securely into FLH HomeX.

boot.title: Start on boot
boot.description: Make the add-on start during a system boot

watchdog.title: Watchdog
watchdog.description: This will start the add-on if it crashes

auto_update.title: Auto update
auto_update.description: Auto update the add-on when there is a new version available

ingress_panel.title: Show in sidebar
ingress_panel.description: Add this add-on to your sidebar

protected.title: Protection mode
protected.description: Blocks elevated system access from the add-on
